text: The Forbidden Door () is a 2009 Indonesian psychological horror movie directed by Joko Anwar and was based on the novel by Sekar Ayu Asmara. It stars Fachri Albar, Marsha Timothy, Ario Bayu, Tio Pakusadewo, Rio Dewanto, Atiqah Hasiholan. ==Other websites== * Category:2009 horror movies Category:Indonesian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joko Anwar
title: The Forbidden Door
